articles.content:
Built-in wallpapers can match your choice, and stay in sync as the day goes on.
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Googles newest update for ChromeOS is rolling out to users this week, and one… [+1363 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 14 will have a bigger camera bump, come in purple and ditch the display notch, leaks suggest - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ahead of its reported release next month, MailOnline rounds up all the rumoured features the new iPhone 14 series may present. These include a new purple colour and a higher resolution camera.
articles.content:
